name: ZONE (Rixic)
description:
This game is highly experimental and is likely to break but the download is there anyway.

Zip around with your grapple hook using Q to attach and de-attach to and from surfaces, using left click to drag and pull yourself while grappled.

Want to know more about this project? Click here.

Design, Direction & Implementation
Myself

Level Design
Myself, Ayet Zaidi, Frederick Bajet, Jordan Fletcher & Yassin
